import React from "react"; export const homedata = [ { id: 1, name: "Ranga Ranga Vaibhavanga", rating: 4.7, time: "2hr : 22mins", desc: "An unfortunate incident sparks a gradual discord between two childhood friends. However, fate brings them together when they enroll in the same medical college, a union that later blooms into love..", starring: " Panja Vaisshnav Tej,Ketika Sharma", genres: "Action", cover: "../images/Img1.png", video: "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J8CvvGRTziQ", date: "2 September 2022", }, { id: 2, name: "Godfather", rating: 4.6, time: "2hr : 22mins", desc: "At Interpol's office in France, an officer is handing over his case about Abraham Qureshi who is a mysterious smuggler kingpin and godfather to his junior, stating that it was his only unsolvable case., along with Kong himself, in the 1933 film King Kong. ", starring: " Chiranjeevi,Salman Khan,Nayanthara", genres: "Adventures", tags: "Adventures,Animation,Family", cover: "../images/Img2.jpg", video: "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mt1OmFL3O34", date: "5 October 2022", }, { id: 3, name: "Sita Ramam", rating: 4.8, time: "2hr : 22mins", desc: "Upon returning to Pakistan, Afreen sets off to fulfil her grandfather's wish of delivering a letter from Ram to Sita. Along the way, she finds Ram and learns about their love story.. ", starring: "Dulquer Salmaan,Mrunal Thakur", genres: "romantic drama", cover: "../images/home3.jpg", video: "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ljk6tGZ1l3A", date: "5 August 2022", }, { id: 4, name: "Sir", rating: 4.9, time: "2hr : 22mins", desc: "A young man faces a difficult time as he struggles against the privatization of education..", starring: "Dhanush,Samyuktha Menon", genres: "Action", cover: "../images/Img5.jpg", video: "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RAu5HSOGvSw", date: "17 February 2023", }, ] export const Homecard = () => { return ( <>
